oscar.Util.Capabilities

Inherits from:oscar.Util

Description: This utility will object capabilities documents for different service types like WMS

Summary
oscar.Util.Capabilities
Constants
EVENT_TYPES{Array(String)} Supported application event types
Functions
getCapabilitiesLaunches the reqest to retreive the Capabilities document from the server.
getParametersReturns parameters to use for the request
successCalled when the capabilities request is successful.
failCalled when the capabilities request fails.
oscar.Util.Capabilities.WMS

Constants

EVENT_TYPES

{Array(String)} Supported application event types

Functions

getCapabilities

getCapabilities:function()

Launches the reqest to retreive the Capabilities document from the server.

getParameters

getParameters:function()

Returns parameters to use for the request

success

success:function(transport)

Called when the capabilities request is successful.  Fires a success event and includes a capabilities object.

fail

fail:function(transport)

Called when the capabilities request fails.  Fires a failure event.

oscar.Util.Capabilities.WMS

Inherits from:oscar.Util.Capabilities

Description: This utility will object capabilities document for a WMS service.

getCapabilities:function()
Launches the reqest to retreive the Capabilities document from the server.
getParameters:function()
Returns parameters to use for the request
success:function(transport)
Called when the capabilities request is successful.
fail:function(transport)
Called when the capabilities request fails.
